content.2: But Nadab and Abihu died before their father, and had no children: therefore Eleazar and Ithamar executed the priest’s office.
content.3: And David distributed them, both Zadok of the sons of Eleazar, and Ahimelech of the sons of Ithamar, according to their offices in their service.
content.4: And there were more chief men found of the sons of Eleazar than of the sons of Ithamar; and
content.5: Thus were they divided by lot, one sort with another; for the governors of the sanctuary, and governors
content.6: And Shemaiah the son of Nethaneel the scribe,
content.7: Now the first lot came forth to Jehoiarib, the second to Jedaiah,
content.8: The third to Harim, the fourth to Seorim,
content.9: The fifth to Malchijah, the sixth to Mijamin,
content.10: The seventh to Hakkoz, the eighth to Abijah,
content.11: The ninth to Jeshua, the tenth to Shecaniah,
content.12: The eleventh to Eliashib, the twelfth to Jakim,
content.13: The thirteenth to Huppah, the fourteenth to Jeshebeab,
content.14: The fifteenth to Bilgah, the sixteenth to Immer,
content.15: The seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Aphses,
content.16: The nineteenth to Pethahiah, the twentieth to Jehezekel,
content.17: The one and twentieth to Jachin, the two and twentieth to Gamul,
content.18: The three and twentieth to Delaiah, the four and twentieth to Maaziah.
content.20: And the rest of the sons of Levi
content.21: Concerning Rehabiah: of the sons of Rehabiah, the first
content.22: Of the Izharites; Shelomoth: of the sons of Shelomoth; Jahath.
content.27: The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.
content.29: Concerning Kish: the son of Kish
content.30: The sons also of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jerimoth. These
content.31: These likewise cast lots over against their brethren the sons of Aaron in the presence of David the king, and Zadok, and Ahimelech, and the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites, even the principal fathers over against their younger brethren.
